description.en: A multiplayer browser game where the objective is to knock all of the opponents off the edge of the screen and be the last man standing.
description.ga_IE: Cluiche Brabhsálaí Multiplayer ina bhfuil an cuspóir chun na opponents go léir a chnagadh as imeall an scáileáin agus an fear deireanach a sheasann.
